title: gnupg
content: SSH  :export GPG_TTY=$(tty)export SSH_AUTH_SOCK=$(gpgconf --list-dirs agent-ssh-socket)  ~/.gnupg/gpg-agent.conf  :enable-ssh-support     :$ ssh-add id_rsaCould not add identity "id_rsa": agent refused operation :$ echo UPDATESTARTUPTTY | gpg-connect-agent

title: uefi
content: ## EFI Stub Kernel         `CONFIG_EFI_STUB`    . ESP    `/esp`,  `/esp/EFI/Linux`   `/boot`.```# mkdir -p /esp# mount /dev/sda1 /esp# mkdir -p /esp/EFI/Linux# mv /boot/* /esp/EFI/Linux# mount -o bind /esp/EFI/Linux /boot# mount /sys/firmware/efi/efivars -o rw,remount# efibootmgr --create --part 1 --disk /dev/sda --label "Linux" --loader '&#92;EFI&#92;Linux&#92;vmlinuz-linux' -u 'initrd=&#92;EFI&#92;Linux&#92;initramfs.img'# mount /sys/firmware/efi/efivars -o ro,remount```
